entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InMemoryDatabase does not support unstructured columns #31969
  • [QUESTION] Switch entity type for a record in TPH keeping same keys #31966
  • Projection filtering on second-level reference could not be translated #31961
  • Remote calls can delay DBContext being disposed? #31957

Closed

  • Update from ef 6 to ef 7. Error getting base type entities where one child has a required navigation property #31107
    7.0.x
  • AddCheckConstraint in model produces different output on linux vs. windows #31895
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • Multiple Navigations to same key when building Migration #31945
  • Error when trying to parameterize Property from ExecuteUpdateAsync: "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.TypedParameterExpression' to type 'System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression'." #31946
  • AsSplitQuery : Remove LEFT JOIN in child query when split the query and join self #31700

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Allow creating properties implicitly even when type is configured as non-property #31968
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Preserve `convertsNulls` in the compiled model #31967
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31965
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31964
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31950
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/7.0] Treat required owned entities on derived types as optional. #31949
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Validate single discriminator values #31937
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Cosmos: Persist non-shadow int keys on owned entity types #31936
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Switch to interpreted client-evaluation in parameter extractor #31784
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the EntityMaterializerSource #31943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31742
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #31954
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #31953
  • [TEST ONLY] More AssertQuery refactoring #31956

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30391 - JSON column issue with SetTableName() #31951
    Servicing-consider
